title: My ranked game just disconnected and I was able to join a new lobby...
body: I was around eight minutes into the game and it just crashed. I disconnected and restarted my league client and was able to join another game. What? Has this happened to anybody before?

replies.body: Ahhhh sounds like that game crashed server side. When that happens, every will be disconnected just like you were except *nobody* will be able to reconnect since the game doesn't exist anymore. It doesn't even give you the option when this happens. No worries, you don't get any penalties since the game technically never happened according to our servers.
